Customer Service Representative (Bilingual – Hausa & Yoruba) Job at Pack ‘N’ Pay




        
    

        
        Pack ‘N’ Pay is a product of CIC Integrated Services LTD. CIC was created as a wholesale store that supplies food to offshore catering companies to feed the offshore workers. Pack ’N’ Pay was created as a product that would leverage technology to solve the problems of retailers and wholesalers. Pack ‘N’ Pay officially started operations on January 18th 2021 and launched her e-commerce website on March 1st 2021.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative (Bilingual – Hausa & Yoruba)

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Pack'N'Pay is seeking a friendly, articulate, and customer-focused Customer Service Representative who is fluent in Hausa and Yoruba.
	The ideal candidate will handle customer inquiries, resolve complaints, onboard new users, and ensure customers enjoy a smooth experience.
	This role is crucial in building trust with customers across different regions and cultures.


Key Responsibilities
Customer Engagement & Support:


	Respond promptly to customer inquiries via phone, WhatsApp, or in-person interactions.
	Communicate effectively in Hausa and Yoruba to serve customers from diverse backgrounds.
	Educate customers about Osusu products, services, and procedures.


Onboarding & Retention:


	Assist with registration and onboarding of new customers, ensuring all details are captured correctly.
	Follow up with users to ensure a smooth experience and encourage long-term engagement.
	Build trust and rapport with new and existing users, especially from Hausa and Yoruba-speaking communities.


Issue Resolution:


	Handle customer complaints professionally and provide timely solutions or escalate when
	needed.
	Track and report recurring issues or feedback to improve service delivery.


Documentation & Reporting:


	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions using internal systems.
	Prepare daily/weekly reports on customer issues, trends, and resolutions.


Team Collaboration:


	Work closely with other customer experience staff to ensure consistency in service delivery.
	Provide cultural/language support for marketing, outreach, and feedback campaigns targeted at Hausa/Yoruba-speaking users.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND, HND, or B.Sc. in any discipline.
	2–3 years of prior experience in customer service or client-facing roles is preferred.
	Fluent in Hausa and Yoruba (spoken is required; written is an advantage).
	Strong interpersonal, communication, and conflict-resolution skills.
	Patient, empathetic, and passionate about customer satisfaction.
	Comfortable using WhatsApp, spreadsheets, and basic digital tools.
	Must be based in Port Harcourt or willing to relocate.


Key Attributes:


	Friendly and warm personality
	Culturally sensitive and respectful
	Excellent listener and communicator
	Reliable, accountable, and detail-oriented


What We Offer


	Competitive salary
	Supportive and youthful work environment
	Opportunity to serve and grow with a fast-expanding financial brand
	Training and development opportunities


Method of Application
Interested and qualified cnadidates should send their cv and cover letter to: hr@packnpay.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Software Developer Job at Green Africa Airways Limited




        
    

        
        Green Africa Airways Limited is a value airline based in Lagos, Nigeria. We are a new carrier that offers safe, reliable and affordable air travel to a much broader group of customers. This positions us as a significant contributor to the economic development of Nigeria and the African continent.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Software Developer

Job Location: Lagos
Job Tye: Full-time (On-site)

Job Role
     

            
    




	Design and develop scalable backend services and RESTful/GraphQL APIs using Laravel PHP and Node.js with NestJS, ensuring application performance and security.
	Build efficient database schemas, optimize queries, and maintain databases including MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
	Create responsive, interactive, and high-performance user interfaces with React and Next.js, implementing modern frontend architectures with effective state management.
	Develop reusable frontend components, maintain design systems, and ensure crossbrowser compatibility and performance optimization.
	Integrate frontend applications seamlessly with backend services, implementing server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) where appropriate.
	Collaborate on end-to-end feature development, participate in architectural decisions, and contribute to technical planning for scalable applications.
	Write comprehensive unit and integration tests, debug and troubleshoot issues across the full stack, and maintain high code quality through code reviews.
	Work closely with DevOps teams to manage deployments, infrastructure, and ensure smooth operation of applications in cloud environments.


Qualifications


	BSc / HND in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, with 4+ years of professional software development experience.
	Strong expertise in backend development using Laravel PHP and Node.js with the NestJS framework.
	Advanced frontend development skills with React and Next.js, including responsive design and state management.
	Proficiency in TypeScript for building type-safe and maintainable code across the stack.
	Knowledge of version control systems (Git) and strong understanding of software testing principles and frameworks.
	Solid understanding of database design, optimization, and experience working with MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
	Experience designing and consuming RESTful APIs, with familiarity in GraphQL and WebSocket integrations.
	Excellent problem-solving, time-management, and organizational skills with the ability to meet time-sensitive deadlines.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with a creative, self-motivated mindset eager to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment. 


Must have skills:


	Knowledge of Programming Languages
	Understanding of Data Structures and Algorithms Experience with Version
	Control Systems Database Management
	Basic Understanding of Operating Systems.

Product Marketing Analyst Job at Helium Health




        
    

        
        Helium Health is a full-service Healthtech company that provides a suite of solutions for healthcare providers, payers, and patients in emerging markets — at the core of which is our SaaS based electronic medical records/hospital management information system (EMR/HMIS).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Product Marketing Analyst

Job Location: Lagos

Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for a strategic and hands-on Product Marketing Analyst.
	This role will be responsible for developing and executing marketing plans and programs to create awareness and demand for the company’s solutions.
	S/he will lead product and feature launches and contribute to larger launches within the team.
	 This role blends product marketing, lifecycle engagement, CRM operations, and campaign management to drive acquisition, activation, retention, and advocacy.
	You will partner closely with Product, Sales, Customer Success, and Data teams to not only ensure adoption, but also consistent usage to achieve operational excellence.


Responsibilities


	Create and maintain product positioning, value proposition and messaging across customer-facing channels and work closely with product management, CX and sales teams to articulate and present a compelling product position. 
	Define the go-to-market strategy for the company’s products, and conduct market research to guide product strategy for enterprise buyers and users. 
	Plan and execute product launches for new features, modules, and adjacent products, partnering with the Product team to communicate features and ensure users understand benefits. 
	Partner with Sales on lead acquisition, qualification and nurturing strategies for inbound and upsell opportunities. Develop and execute marketing plans and programs to create awareness and product demand, utilizing digital marketing tools. 
	Design and execute automated lifecycle campaigns across email, SMS, and in-app messaging to support onboarding, activation, reactivation, upsell, and advocacy.
	Build customer segments based on activity, feature adoption, usage gaps, institution type, lifecycle milestones etc.
	Manage CRM platform for campaign setup, audience segmentation, A/B testing, and performance reporting.
	Collaborate with the CX team to track adoption, usage, retention, and churn metrics with product analytics tools. Analyze data and use insights to inform campaign targeting, customer engagement, promotions and support interventions. including Competitive Analysis, Technical Writing, Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) assessment, and Recency, Frequency, and Monetary (RFM) analysis.
	Deliver internal training for the sales team, create marketing collateral and sales enablement materials highlighting workflow improvements and competitive advantages.
	Any other related duties as required. 


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Communications, Marketing or any other related field is required
	3 - 5 years of professional experience as a product marketer within the tech industry. 
	Proof of work in the areas of product development, or product marketing with SaaS companies or an OEM would be a plus.
	Proven ability to plan and execute GTM strategies for tech products, ideally in healthcare or SaaS.
	Strong CRM and marketing automation skills.
	Excellent copywriting, campaign planning, and storytelling skills. Incredible at articulating the essence of products and the value they create. Can simplify complex products for consumers to understand.

	Comfortable working cross-functionally and in a fast-paced, high-growth environment.
	Experience using data to make decisions and drive growth, crafting a compelling narrative across different channels and matching the message to the medium.
	Excellent project management skills with a keen attention to detail.
	Experience in planning, setting metrics, and roadmap development
	International experience
	High proficiency in all areas of Microsoft Office including Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint
	Knowledge of healthcare technology or EMR systems is a plus.


Benefits


	This role offers a competitive salary in a collaborative work environment with a dynamic and diverse team.
	We also offer tremendous potential with a growing global organization. 
	Package includes guaranteed take home 
	20 days holidays + public holidays 
	Enhanced Parental + Family Leave – 60 days paid Maternity Leave and 20 days paid Paternity Leave. Our Adoption Leave policy follows the similar arrangements. 
	Health Insurance or Medical Allowance 
	Robust Learning and Development Opportunities 
	Team-building activities and social events 
	Amazing team culture!

Pack ’N’ Pay was created as a product that would leverage technology to solve the problems of retailers and wholesalers. Pack ‘N’ Pay officially started operations on January 18th 2021 and launched her e-commerce website on March 1st 2021.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Osusu Field Agent
     

            
    



Job Locations: Sapele, Warri, Asaba - Delta, Aba, Umuahia - Abia, Eket, Uyo - Akwa Ibom, Nnewi, Onitsha - Anambra, Yenagoa - Bayelsa, Nsukka - Enugu, Calabar - Cross River, Owerri - Imo, Abakaliki - Ebonyi, Amuwo-Odofin, Somolu, Alimosho, Kosofe, Mushin, Oshodi-Isolo, Ojo,

	We are seeking energetic, passionate, results-driven, and persuasive field agents to drive customer acquisition and retention for our e-commerce platform.
	Your primary responsibility will be to encourage people to download and sign up on the app/website, guiding them through onboarding, educating them on how to use it, and following up regularly to ensure timely payments.
	You’ll play a critical role in building trust, increasing adoption, and supporting customers throughout their shopping journey.


Key Responsibilities
Customer Acquisition:


	Actively engage potential customers in local communities, markets, residential areas, offices, churches, etc.
	Encourage them to download and sign up on the app.
	Guide users through the onboarding process and explain benefits clearly.


Customer Education:


	Explain how the instalment payment system works.
	Highlight benefits such as price protection, ease of payment, protection against inflation and product availability.
	Answer questions and provide basic support during onboarding.


Follow-Up and Payment Monitoring:


	Maintain a list of registered customers and their payment schedules.

	Assist customers with payment challenges.


Relationship Building:


	Build trust and long-term relationships with customers.
	Act as a liaison between the company and customers to address or escalate issues.


Reporting & Feedback:


	Provide daily/weekly reports on sign-ups, follow-ups, and customer feedback.
	Share field insights to improve product offerings and customer experience.


Requirements


	Minimum of NCE/OND (higher qualifications are an advantage).
	2–4 years of experience in sales, field marketing, or customer service.

	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Confidence in engaging with people from diverse backgrounds.
	Tech-savvy; must own a smartphone and be comfortable using mobile apps.
	Highly self-motivated and results-driven.
	Fluency in English and local languages.
